All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminActivity
AdminActivity provides the main dashboard for administrators to manage various application aspects such as facilities, user profiles, and events.
AdminEventAdapter
AdminEventAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of events in a ListView, with buttons for viewing and deleting each event.
AdminEventDetailsActivity
AdminEventDetailsActivity displays event details for administrators and provides options to manage the event, such as removing the poster or QR code.
AdminManageEventsActivity
AdminManageEventsActivity displays a list of all events and allows administrators to manage them.
AdminVerification
AdminVerification handles the validation of admin privileges by checking the device ID against stored records in Firebase Firestore.
AdminVerificationTest
 
AutoNotChosenForFinalList
Activity that handles sending notifications to selected and non-selected entrants for a specific event.
AutoNotChosenForFinalListTest
 
CreateEventActivity
CreateEventActivity handles event creation by collecting details like title, date, price, and an image.
CustomToAllActivity
Combines functionality for managing notification sending and dynamic list fetching based on the intent type (1 = Waiting List, 2 = Selected Entrants, 3 = Final Entrants).
EditEventActivity
EditEventActivity allows for editing an existing event.
Event
Represents an event in the application.
EventArrayAdapter
EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView, with buttons for viewing, editing, and deleting each event.
EventArrayAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Interface to define the actions for each button in the event item layout.
EventFinalListActivity
EventFinalListActivity displays the final list of entrants for a specific event.
EventPosterActivity
EventPosterActivity is responsible for generating an event poster based on the details provided by CreateEventActivity through the intent.
EventResultList
EventResultList is an Activity that displays the selected and canceled entrants for a specific event.
EventsActivity
This activity serves as the main interface for managing and navigating event-related features in the application.
EventsJoinedActivity
Activity that displays a list of events the current device has signed up for.
EventsJoinedAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of events the user has signed up for.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilityAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of facility names, with options to view or delete each facility.
FacilityProfileActivity
The FacilityProfileActivity class provides the UI and functionality for managing a facility profile.
FirestoreHelper
A helper class for interacting with Firestore to manage user profile operations.
GeocodeResponse
GeocodeResponse class represents the response from a geocoding API, containing a list of results with location coordinates.
GeocodeResponse.Result
represents an individual geocoding result containing geometry information (latitude and longitude).
GeocodeResponse.Result.Geometry
Represents the geometry of a location, including latitude and longitude.
GeocodingApi
 
ListSamplingActivity
ListSamplingActivity is for managing the random selection of participants from the event's waiting list.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the entry point of the app.
ManageEventsActivity
ManageEventsActivity is responsible for managing and displaying events created by the current device.
ManageFacilitiesActivity
ManageFacilitiesActivity is responsible for displaying and managing the list of facilities in the admin interface.
ManageNotificationsActivity
ManageNotificationsActivity is responsible for displaying and managing the list of notifications for the user.
ManageProfileActivity
ManageProfileActivity is to manage and view user profiles.
ManagingWaitListActivity
ManagingWaitListActivity to manage the waiting list of an event.
MapActivity
MapActivity is responsible for displaying a Google Map with markers for locations retrieved from a Firestore document associated with a specific event ID.
MapActivity.OnLocationValidatedListener
Listener interface for handling the result of a location validation process.
NotificationArrayAdapter
NotificationArrayAdapter is to display notifications in a ListView.
NotificationForegroundService
NotificationForegroundService is a foreground service that fetches event notifications from a Firestore database and displays them as Android system notifications.
Notifications
Represents a notification sent to a user related to an event.
NotificationSettingsActivity
Activity that handles the settings for notifications, allowing the user to enable or disable notifications.
OrganizerSendsNotification
Activity that handles sending notifications to selected and non-selected entrants for a specific event.
ProfileDetailActivity
Activity for displaying and managing the details of a user profile.
ProfileDetailActivityTest
 
ProfilesActivity
ProfilesActivity is responsible for displaying the profile options to the user.
QRDisplayActivity
QRDisplayActivity is responsible for displaying the QR code text that was scanned by the user.
QRScannerActivity
QRScannerActivity is responsible for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
QRScannerActivityTest
 
TestCreateEventActivity
 
TestEventPosterActivity
 
TestViewFacilityProfile
 
UserProfile
Represents a user's profile containing their personal details and the events they have joined.
UserProfileActivity
Activity for managing the user's profile, including updating personal details (name, email, phone number), uploading/removing profile images, and saving the profile to Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage.
UserProfileArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of UserProfile objects in a ListView.
UserProfileManager
Singleton class for managing the UserProfile throughout the application.
ViewEventActivity
ViewEventActivity is to view event details and sign up for an event by adding the device to the waiting list.
ViewEventsJoined
ViewsEventsJoined is an activity that displays the details of an event the user has joined.
ViewFacilityActivity
Activity that displays details of a specific facility.
WaitingListActivity
Activity that displays the waiting list for a specific event.
WaitingListArrayAdapter
WaitingListArrayAdapter for displaying a list of user profiles on the waiting list of an event.
